concepts.SYSTOLIC_BLOOD_PRESSURE_8_DESC: A patient's systolic blood pressure measurement (taken with a manual cuff in either a sitting or standing position)

concepts.BODY_POSITION_28_DESC: Body position for procedure or blood pressure measurement
concepts.DIASTOLIC_BLOOD_PRESSURE_9_DESC: A patient's diastolic blood pressure measurement (taken with a manual cuff in either a sitting or standing position)
